mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, MEMBER_ID AS memberId, MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, CREATED_AT AS createdAt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N') AS boardCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER = M.MEMBER_NO) AS followCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER = M.MEMBER_NO) AS followerCount, MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL AS memberDelBanFl FROM MEMBER M WHERE ADMIN NOT IN (2) ORDER BY MEMBER_NO ASC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = CASE WHEN MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = '1' THEN '2' WHEN MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL = '2' THEN '1' ELSE MEMBER_DEL_BAN_FL END WHERE MEMBER_NICKNAME = #{memberNickname}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, B.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, B.READ_COUNT AS readCount, B.BOARD_DEL_FL AS boardDelFl FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DEL_FL = CASE WHEN BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' THEN 'Y' WHEN BOARD_DEL_FL = 'Y' THEN 'N' ELSE BOARD_DEL_FL END WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE CONTENT_CATEGORY = '1'

SELECT R.REPORT_NO AS reportNo, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, B.BOARD_NO AS boardNo, B.BOARD_CONTENT AS boardContent, R.REPORT_CATEGORY AS reportCategory, R.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, B.BOARD_DEL_FL AS boardDelFl, R.REPORT_VIEW AS reportView FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD B ON (B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE CONTENT_CATEGORY = '1' ORDER BY R.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT WHERE CONTENT_CATEGORY = '2'

SELECT R.REPORT_NO AS reportNo, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, R.CONTENT_NO AS boardNo, C.COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, R.REPORT_CATEGORY AS reportCategory, R.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, C.COMMENT_DEL_FL AS commentDelFl, R.REPORT_VIEW AS reportView FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN "COMMENT" C ON (M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE CONTENT_CATEGORY = '2' ORDER BY R.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
